title: The Escape: Soren's Saga
description: Dancing, loud music, drinking, and sex… Working as a dancer in a local gay nightclub might seem like the perfect job, but appearances can be deceiving. When Soren’s livelihood depends on a vile man with dirty secrets, he does what he can to make it through each day.Even when those secrets are tearing him apart. Remy Moretti lives in a world of precision and order, ruled by his extreme OCD. When a chance run-in with a sassy, sarcastic blond twelve years his junior upsets his structured world, Remy needs to find out who he is. What he discovers makes his hair stand on end. What is going on at that club? Someone needs to get to the bottom of this. Until then, Remy will do whatever it takes to keep Soren safe.
author: Nicky James
